basics.name: Hongliang Lu
basics.label: Graduate Student & RL Algorithm Engineer
basics.summary: Graduate student at Peking University focusing on optimization algorithms, large language models, and LLM4OPT. Experienced RL algorithm engineer with internships at Alibaba and Moonshot AI.

work.name: Alibaba Group - Quark - Large Model Training and Application - RL Team
work.summary: Developed and optimized reinforcement learning algorithms for large language models. Contributed to model training infrastructure and application development.

work.name: Moonshot AI (Kimi) - RL Team - WebAgent Project
work.summary: Implemented reinforcement learning algorithms for web-based autonomous agents. Developed and tested RL strategies for complex web interaction tasks.

awards.title: Outstanding Graduate
awards.summary: Awarded for excellent academic performance in Robotics Engineering program.

projects.name: LLM4OPT Research
projects.summary: Research project investigating the application of large language models in optimization problems, exploring novel approaches to integrate LLMs with traditional optimization algorithms.

projects.name: WebAgent Reinforcement Learning
projects.summary: Development of reinforcement learning algorithms for web-based autonomous agents, focusing on complex web interaction tasks and decision-making processes.
